title: Templates & Interpolation
subject: Angular
theory: Templates are HTML with special Angular syntax. Interpolation {{ }} allows you to embed expressions. It evaluates the expression and converts the result to a string.

examples.explanation: Interpolation can bind properties and method return values.

common_mistakes.correction: Interpolation expressions should be side-effect free and fast.

interview_questions.question: Can you use JavaScript 'window' object in templates?
interview_questions.answer: No, templates only have access to the component instance members.

exam_notes: {{ }} is one-way from class to view.
summary: Interpolation is the primary way to output dynamic text in Angular applications.
